Name: Don't hesitate to contact us on social media or uhjpsoc@gmail.com
Welcome to the Redeemed Christian Fellowship
Email: University of Hertfordshire. A Christian fellowship run by students with the aim of spreading the gospel and influencing our world. Our aim is to share the love of Christ which we have received
column3: as we encourage each other in our growth in the faith. Do you have questions or just curious about who we are
column4: and whom we believe in and why? just send us an email on rcffellowship03@gmail.com or call us on 07975649404
column5: we usually meet at The Key Centre
column9: 7-8.30pm. pls send us an email for our location. We look forward to meeting you.

Name: If you have any questions you can email us at salemhertfordshire@hotmail.co.uk
Society Of Psychology And Sport Sciences
The society is open to all students and you’re welcome to join at any point during the year. If you have any questions
Email: please feel free to send us an email at unicef_uh@yahoo.com – we’d love to hear from you! You can also join the society for free and send an email for society collaborations as well.
